req.Sentence: The external email system is to provide a messaging service from Mashbot to the Mashbot users.
req.Expression: provide a messaging service from Mashbot to the Mashbot users

req.Sentence: The format uses SMTP protocol.
req.Expression: uses SMTP protocol

req.Sentence: Contributors may create new content, import existing content into the system, edit content, and delete it.
req.Expression: create new content, import existing content into the system, edit content, and delete it

req.Sentence: Approvers can approve actions performed by contributors.
req.Expression: approve actions performed by contributors

req.Sentence: The system allows users to modify their accounts once created.
req.Expression: modify their accounts once created

req.Sentence: The system requires that a user have logged in before modifications can be made.
req.Expression: have logged in before modifications can be made

req.Sentence: A campaign has the following components: Name, Pieces of content, Schedule, User/Group Permissions.
req.Expression: has the following components: Name, Pieces of content, Schedule, User/Group Permissions

req.Sentence: A schedule is a mapping of times to publishing actions. It may contain any actions a publisher can perform, and these actions are performed at the associated time.
req.Expression: is a mapping of times to publishing actions. It may contain any actions a publisher can perform, and these actions are performed at the associated time

req.Sentence: A piece of content may take the following forms: Text, Image, Audio, Video.
req.Expression: may take the following forms: Text, Image, Audio, Video

req.Sentence: Mashbot will allow for the association of Mashbot accounts with external service accounts.
req.Expression: allow for the association of Mashbot accounts with external service accounts

req.Sentence: Mashbot will provide an interface for authenticating a user account to an external service account.
req.Expression: provide an interface for authenticating a user account to an external service account

req.Sentence: Mashbot will provide a standardized method of interacting with external service accounts.
req.Expression: provide a standardized method of interacting with external service accounts

req.Sentence: The system encrypts data over a direct connection between the web client and the server.
req.Expression: encrypts data over a direct connection between the web client and the server

req.Sentence: The system allows for the backup of the data system to local or remote non-volatile storage systems.
req.Expression: allows for the backup of the data system to local or remote non-volatile storage systems

req.Sentence: The system uses the configured authentication module. The authentication method is configurable by the System Administrator.
req.Expression: uses the configured authentication module. The authentication method is configurable by the System Administrator

req.Sentence: The system allows the System Administrator to configure a timeout after which a user is automatically logged out of Mashbot.
req.Expression: allows the System Administrator to configure a timeout after which a user is automatically logged out of Mashbot

req.Sentence: A user should be able to register a new account
req.Expression: register a new account

req.Sentence: A user should be able to log in
req.Expression: log in

req.Sentence: A member should be able to log out
req.Expression: log out

req.Sentence: A member should have a profile
req.Expression: have a profile
